sentence: Tap, click or scroll to read more g What happened: Firebrand Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-Ga.) said she agreed with Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R-N.C.) that Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy and his government are corrupt.
title: Mo Brooks, jilted by Donald Trump, says the former president discussed rescinding the 2020 election with him during the last six months.

sentence: That story has repeated itself again as House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy (R-Calif.) told reporters on Wednesday that he may take further action to condemn Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R-N.C.), who conceded that he exaggerated? in saying recently that GOP members invited him to orgies and that he saw them doing cocaine regularly (The Hill).
author: Alexis Simendinger
title: The Hill's Morning Report  Some brighter news for Biden?

sentence: Rep. Madison Cawthorn speaks before a rally for former U.S. President Donald Trump at The Farm at 95 on April 9, 2022 in Selma, North Carolina.
author: Cheryl Teh
title: Madison Cawthorn criticized GOP leaders for 'weakening' and 'cheapening' the Republican party's platform and chasing 'non-existent middle-ground voters'
